Terra.timeInput.instructionsHourMinuteSe: Enter a 12-hour clock value using a two digit hour, two digit minute, and two digit second format, then select the AM or PM radio button. Entering a two digit hour will automatically move to the minute field. Entering a a two digit minute will automatically move to the second field. Arrow up and down to step the hour, minute, and second values. Arrow left and right between the hour, minute, and second fields. Tab between the hour, minute, second, and am/pm radios. The hour, minute, second and am/pm work together to make one time value.
Terra.timeInput.instructionsHourMinute12: Enter a 12-hour clock value using a two digit hour, and two digit minute format, then select the AM or PM radio button. Entering a two digit hour will automatically move to the minute field. Arrow up and down to step the hour and minute values. Arrow left and right between the hour and minute fields. Tab between the hour, minute, and am/pm radios The hour, minute, and am/pm radios work together to make one time value.
Terra.timeInput.instructionsHourMinuteSe: Enter a 24-hour clock value using a two digit hour, two digit minute, and two digit second format. Entering a two digit hour will automatically move to the minute field. Entering a two digit minute will automatically move to the second field. Arrow up and down to step the hour, minute, and second values. Arrow left and right or Tab between the hour, minute, and second fields. The hour, minute, and second fields work together to make one time value.
Terra.timeInput.instructionsHourMinute24: Enter a 24-hour clock value using a two digit hour and two digit minute format. Entering a two digit hour will automatically move to the minute field. Arrow up and down to step the hour and minute values. Arrow left and right or Tab between the hour and minute fields. The hour and minute fields work together to make one time value.
